description: This file defines a mock class 'StorageManagerMock' for the 'IStorageManager' interface, utilizing Google Mock to facilitate unit testing of storage management functionalities. It includes mock method implementations for various storage-related operations such as create, get, delete, and clear storage, as well as reference counting methods.

classes.name: StorageManagerMock
classes.description: A Google Mock-based mock class for the IStorageManager interface, used for unit testing components that depend on storage management.

methods.name: CreateStorage
methods.description: Mocks object creation of storage with specified application ID and size, outputting a path and error reason.

methods.name: GetStorage
methods.description: Mocks retrieval of storage details such as path, size, and used space for a given application ID and user/group IDs.

methods.name: DeleteStorage
methods.description: Mocks deletion of storage identified by application ID, providing an error reason if applicable.

methods.name: Clear
methods.description: Mocks clearing storage for a specified application ID with error reporting.

methods.name: ClearAll
methods.description: Mocks clearing all storage except for exempted application IDs, with error reason reporting.

methods.name: AddRef
methods.description: Mocks incrementing the reference count of the mock object.

methods.name: Release
methods.description: Mocks decrementing the reference count of the mock object.

methods.name: QueryInterface
methods.description: Mocks querying for interface support based on an interface number.

calls: MOCK_METHOD(Core::hresult, CreateStorage, (const string& appId, const uint32_t& size, string& path, string& errorReason), (override))
MOCK_METHOD(Core::hresult, GetStorage, (const string& appId, const int32_t& userId, const int32_t& groupId, string& path, uint32_t& size, uint32_t& used), (override))
MOCK_METHOD(Core::hresult, DeleteStorage, (const string& appId, string& errorReason), (override))
MOCK_METHOD(Core::hresult, Clear, (const string& appId, string& errorReason), (override))
MOCK_METHOD(Core::hresult, ClearAll, (const string& exemptionAppIds, string& errorReason), (override))
